feed.title: ShellHub Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for ShellHub: v0.18.0
entry.content:
Since November, we have been working hard to bring significant improvements to ShellHub. This release represents a major step forward, introducing new features, enhancements, and fixes that will greatly enhance your experience. We appreciate your support and feedback as we continue to evolve!

üåü Key Highlights

Enhanced UI and Terminal Experience

  • Improved fullscreen terminal behavior for a seamless user experience.
  • Enhanced session playback UI with better controls and fullscreen support.

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/881cd9fc-25c5-4826-9381-ac68b2a2c6ed

ShellHub Connector - Container Access via ShellHub

  • Introduced ShellHub Connector, allowing Docker containers from a host to be accessed via ShellHub.

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/6cf8190f-a12c-4be4-817b-8c45a3407486

HTTP Tunnel Support

  • Implemented HTTP Tunnel Support for Enterprise and Cloud Editions, enabling secure and efficient remote access.

https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/880494f2-8b40-4353-a12a-286e3e6084c1

üöÄ New Features

Namespace Enhancements

  • Added support for namespace-based routing. #4319
  • Introduced a namespace type field in CLI and API. #4237
  • Implemented the ability to leave a namespace. #4340
  • Default namespace type is now set to team. #4342

SSH Improvements

  • Simplified session handling, improved recording, and enabled PTY session recording. #4324
  • Added support for SSH agent forwarding. #4346
  • Enhanced session recording using WebSocket and writer adapter. #4352
  • Added session events tracking. #4363
  • Improved session playback UI. #4534

Tunnels & Proxy Enhancements

  • Renamed "Public URL" feature to "Tunnels" with various improvements. #4381
  • Added TTL support and expiration management for tunnels. #4504
  • Improved Nginx load balancing and DNS resolution. #4536

UI & UX Enhancements

  • Enhanced AppBar with Gravatar integration and layout adjustments. #4326
  • Introduced a new settings interface. #4379
  • Improved terminal rendering and fullscreen behavior. #4532
  • Improved session playback UI. #4534
  • Enhanced notification and error handling for user input. #4412
  • Introduced Chatwoot for help and support. #4325
  • Added "Add Docker Host" button and dialog. #4525

Authentication & Security

  • Added SAML SSO support for enterprise instances. #4361
  • Added an origin attribute to users. #4367

üõ†Ô∏è Fixes & Optimizations

General Fixes

  • Improved container height and theme compatibility. #4337
  • Resolved various UI layout inconsistencies. #4338, #4351
  • Fixed API key page header. #4508
  • Fixed terminal auto-open behavior. #4538
  • Enhanced menu behavior and item visibility. #4419
  • Improved error handling in UI components. #4428

Backend & Performance Optimizations

  • Simplified GeoIP initialization. #4447
  • Improved DNS resolution and worker initialization. #4494
  • Enhanced session recording queue processing. #4446

üì¶ Dependencies Updates

Dependencies Upgraded

  • Various UI dependencies updated, including Vue, Vite, Sass, and TypeScript.
  • Backend dependencies updated, including Echo, MongoDB driver, and GoCrypto.
  • Docker base images bumped to newer versions.

üìå Full Changelog: Compare v0.17.2...v0.18.0

entry.title: New release for ShellHub: v0.18.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore(deps): bump docker/login-action from 2 to 3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4548
  • chore(deps): bump golang.org/x/net from 0.26.0 to 0.33.0 in /gateway by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4550
  • chore: bump shellhub version to v0.18.1 by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4551

Full Changelog: https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/compare/v0.18.0...v0.18.1

entry.title: New release for ShellHub: v0.18.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • ui: bump vuetify from 3.7.7 to 3.7.9 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4549
  • fix(ui): improve terminal dialog behavior and ESC key handling by @luannmoreira in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4552
  • fix(ui): adjust TerminalDialog max-width logic by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4553
  • fix(enterprise): pass saml envs to enterprise containers by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4554
  • chore: bump shellhub version to v0.18.2-rc.1 by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4555
  • fix(enterprise): pass saml envs to cloud-pi container by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4557
  • fix(docker): prevent empty environment variables in compose files by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4558
  • docs(enterprise): explain SHELLHUB_SAML_SECRET by @heiytor in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4556
  • chore: bump shellhub version to v0.18.2-rc.2 by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4559
  • ssh: bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.32.0 to 0.33.0 in /ssh by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4572
  • docker: ui: bump nginx from 1.27.3-alpine to 1.27.4-alpine in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4570
  • ui: bump vite-node from 1.6.0 to 1.6.1 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4569
  • ui: bump vitest from 2.1.8 to 2.1.9 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4568
  • ui: bump @vitest/coverage-v8 from 2.1.8 to 2.1.9 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4567
  • ui: bump vite-plugin-vuetify from 2.0.4 to 2.1.0 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4566
  • api: bump golang.org/x/crypto from 0.32.0 to 0.33.0 in /api by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4571
  • docker: gateway: bump golang from 1.22.6-alpine3.20 to 1.23.6-alpine3.20 in /gateway by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4564
  • ui: bump terser from 5.37.0 to 5.38.1 in /ui by @dependabot in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4565
  • chore: bump shellhub version to v0.18.2 by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4573

Full Changelog: https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/compare/v0.18.1...v0.18.2

entry.title: New release for ShellHub: v0.18.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(ui): improve conditional chatwoot usage by @luannmoreira in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4575
  • feat(ui): redesign terminal login form by @Ossanes in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4563
  • fix(gateway): use tunnels domain to load SSL certificates by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4579
  • fix(ui): show tunnels domain when defined by @henrybarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4580
  • chore: bump shellhub version to v0.18.3 by @gustavosbarreto in https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/pull/4581

Full Changelog: https://github.com/shellhub-io/shellhub/compare/v0.18.2...v0.18.3

entry.title: New release for ShellHub: v0.19.0
entry.content:
üöÄ ShellHub v0.19.0 is here!

ShellHub v0.19.0 delivers important improvements across our open-source and managed offerings. This release focuses on refining the user experience, expanding compatibility, and improving reliability across all environments.

‚ú® Highlights

üíÖ Improved User Experience

We‚Äôve made significant enhancements to the UI, making it easier to navigate, maintain, and extend:

  • Migration to <script setup> syntax in the Vue UI
  • Refactored layout handling and session list
  • Improved Snackbar system and notification center
  • Simplified logic and cleaner state separation

These improvements pave the way for faster feature development and a smoother experience.

üê≥ Podman Support

ShellHub now detects and works with Podman as an alternative to Docker. üêß

A great step toward supporting a broader range of container runtimes.

üìº Session Recording (Cloud/Enterprise)

‚òÅÔ∏è Cloud/Enterprise only: Session recording now uses the Asciinema format, a well-established and community-driven standard for terminal session playback. This transition not only improves compatibility with a wide range of tools but also introduces a cleaner, more efficient experience through the use of the official Asciinema player, now embedded directly into ShellHub.

Along with this, we moved from MongoDB-based storage to S3-compatible object storage systems such as MinIO or other cloud-native solutions. This shift brings several key advantages:

  • Performance: Offloads large recording data from the database to optimized storage
  • Scalability: Better supports growing session data with horizontal scale
  • Flexibility: Enables plug-and-play storage backends depending on the environment
  • Interoperability: Recordings can be reused or analyzed outside ShellHub with standard tools

Support for long-running sessions is now more reliable thanks to a configurable timeout mechanism.

üßë‚Äçüíº Invite Members with One Click (Cloud/Enterprise)

‚òÅÔ∏è Cloud/Enterprise only: You can now generate invite links to onboard new members to your namespace. Just share the link, and they‚Äôre ready to go. ‚ú®

Great for teams growing fast or onboarding collaborators in managed environments.

üåê HTTP Tunnel Enhancements (Cloud/Enterprise)

Bidirectional communication is now fully supported over HTTP tunnels, improving compatibility with a wider range of client setups and enabling more interactive use cases.

üõ°Ô∏è Better Authentication, SSO, and Namespace Management (Cloud/Enterprise)

‚òÅÔ∏è Cloud/Enterprise only: We've made several improvements to authentication, SSO workflows, and namespace management in managed environments:

  • SAML users receive more consistent usernames, reducing identity mismatches
  • SSO logins now support fallback behaviors and improved parsing of identity attributes
  • Invite links now set member status to "pending" by default for better access control

These changes improve reliability, traceability, and access control across the platform.

üí° Architecture & Infrastructure

  • ‚òÅÔ∏è Cloud/Enterprise: Migrated from macroservices to monolith architecture for better stability and deployment simplicity
  • ‚òÅÔ∏è Cloud/Enterprise: Removed legacy dashboard and consolidated management into the Admin UI
  • Full dependency refresh across components (Alpine, Node, Vuetify, Cobra, etc.)

üë©‚Äçüéì Community & Team Contributions

We‚Äôd like to highlight these contributors:

  • üíú @luizhf42, a new core team member leading many UI enhancements and structural refactors
  • üôå @No9, a community contributor who added Podman support ‚Äî a great step toward runtime diversity

Thanks for pushing ShellHub forward! üåü

üìö Full Changelog

Explore all commits and merged pull requests: üîó Compare v0.18.3...v0.19.0
